console.log("ExchangeA reserves:", reserve0.toString(), reserve1.toString());
const [reserve0, reserve1] = await Promise.all([exchangeA.reserve0(), exchangeA.reserve1()]);
const exchangeA = await ethers.getContractAt("Exchange", "0xCf7Ed3AccA5a467e9e704C703E8D87F634fB0Fc9");
// Check ExchangeA reserves
console.log("ExchangeA TokenA balance:", balanceA.toString());
const balanceA = await tokenA.balanceOf("0xCf7Ed3AccA5a467e9e704C703E8D87F634fB0Fc9");
const tokenA = await ethers.getContractAt("TokenA", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512");
